# Latex

$$\hat y_{i} = \sum x_{i}^2$$

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

x_cubed <- function(x){
     cubed=x^3
     return(cubed)
}

x_cubed(2)

```

this is 4 cubed = `r x_cubed(4)`
